pokemon.name: chikorita
pokemon.description:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

pokemon.name: bayleef
pokemon.description:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.

pokemon.name: meganium
pokemon.description:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

pokemon.name: cyndaquil
pokemon.description:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.

pokemon.name: quilava
pokemon.description:
Be careful if it
turns its back
during battle. It means that it will
attack with the
fire on its back.

pokemon.name: typhlosion
pokemon.description:
If its rage peaks,
it becomes so hot
that anything that touches it will
instantly go
up in flames.

pokemon.name: totodile
pokemon.description:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

pokemon.name: croconaw
pokemon.description:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

pokemon.name: feraligatr
pokemon.description:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

pokemon.name: pidgey
pokemon.description:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

pokemon.name: pidgeotto
pokemon.description:
Very protective
of its sprawling
territorial area, this POKéMON will
fiercely peck at
any intruder.

pokemon.name: pidgeot
pokemon.description:
When hunting, it
skims the surface
of water at high speed to pick off
unwary prey such
as MAGIKARP.

pokemon.name: spearow
pokemon.description:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.

pokemon.name: fearow
pokemon.description:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

pokemon.name: hoothoot
pokemon.description:
It always stands
on one foot. It
changes feet so fast, the movement
can rarely be
seen.

pokemon.name: noctowl
pokemon.description:
Its eyes are
specially adapted.
They concentrate even faint light
and enable it to
see in the dark.

pokemon.name: rattata
pokemon.description:
キバが２つ。とにかく　なんでも
かじってみる。１ぴき　みつけたら
４０ぴきは　そこに　すんでるはず。

pokemon.name: raticate
pokemon.description:
Ses pattes arrière lui permettent de traverser les
rivières. Il est toujours en quête de nourriture.

pokemon.name: sentret
pokemon.description:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

pokemon.name: furret
pokemon.description:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.

pokemon.name: pichu
pokemon.description:
It is not yet
skilled at storing
electricity. It may send out a
jolt if amused
or startled.

pokemon.name: pikachu
pokemon.description:
When several of
these POKéMON
gather, their electricity could
build and cause
lightning storms.

pokemon.name: raichu
pokemon.description:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

pokemon.name: caterpie
pokemon.description:
如果碰到牠頭上的觸角，
牠就會分泌強烈的臭味
來保護自己。

pokemon.name: metapod
pokemon.description:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

pokemon.name: butterfree
pokemon.description:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.

pokemon.name: weedle
pokemon.description:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

pokemon.name: kakuna
pokemon.description:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

pokemon.name: beedrill
pokemon.description:
It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemon.name: ledyba
pokemon.description:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

pokemon.name: ledian
pokemon.description:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

pokemon.name: spinarak
pokemon.description:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.

pokemon.name: ariados
pokemon.description:
也有地区会使用
阿利多斯的丝来织布。
因布料结实而广受好评。

pokemon.name: geodude
pokemon.description:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

pokemon.name: graveler
pokemon.description:
De naturaleza descuidada y libre, no le importa
dañarse cuando baja rodando montañas.

pokemon.name: golem
pokemon.description:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

pokemon.name: zubat
pokemon.description:
因為沒有眼珠所以看不見東西。
會從口中發出超音波
來探測周圍的狀況。

pokemon.name: golbat
pokemon.description:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: crobat
pokemon.description:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

pokemon.name: cleffa
pokemon.description:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.

pokemon.name: clefairy
pokemon.description:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

pokemon.name: clefable
pokemon.description:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

pokemon.name: igglybuff
pokemon.description:
It has a very soft
body. If it starts
to roll, it will bounce all over
and be impossible
to stop.

pokemon.name: jigglypuff
pokemon.description:
When its huge eyes
light up, it sings
a mysteriously soothing melody
that lulls its
enemies to sleep.

pokemon.name: wigglytuff
pokemon.description:
The body is soft
and rubbery. When
angered, it will suck in air and
inflate itself to
an enormous size.

pokemon.name: togepi
pokemon.description:
The shell seems to
be filled with
joy. It is said that it will share
good luck when
treated kindly.

pokemon.name: togetic
pokemon.description:
They say that it
will appear before
kindhearted, car­ ing people and
shower them with
happiness.

pokemon.name: sandshrew
pokemon.description:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

pokemon.name: sandslash
pokemon.description:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

pokemon.name: ekans
pokemon.description:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

pokemon.name: arbok
pokemon.description:
It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.

pokemon.name: dunsparce
pokemon.description:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

pokemon.name: mareep
pokemon.description:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

pokemon.name: flaaffy
pokemon.description:
푹신푹신한 털은 전기를
모으기 쉽지만 고무 같은 피부
덕분에 자신은 마비되지 않는다.

pokemon.name: ampharos
pokemon.description:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

pokemon.name: wooper
pokemon.description:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

pokemon.name: quagsire
pokemon.description:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

pokemon.name: gastly
pokemon.description:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

pokemon.name: haunter
pokemon.description:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

pokemon.name: gengar
pokemon.description:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.

pokemon.name: unown
pokemon.description:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.

pokemon.name: onix
pokemon.description:
As it grows, the
stone portions of
its body harden to become similar
to a diamond, but
colored black.

pokemon.name: steelix
pokemon.description:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

pokemon.name: bellsprout
pokemon.description:
A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

pokemon.name: weepinbell
pokemon.description:
It spits out
POISONPOWDER to
immobilize the enemy and then
finishes it with
a spray of ACID.

pokemon.name: victreebel
pokemon.description:
Dieses Pokémon soll in großen Kolonien
tief im Dschungel leben, doch niemand
kann dies bestätigen.

pokemon.name: hoppip
pokemon.description:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

pokemon.name: skiploom
pokemon.description:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

pokemon.name: jumpluff
pokemon.description:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

pokemon.name: paras
pokemon.description:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

pokemon.name: parasect
pokemon.description:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

pokemon.name: poliwag
pokemon.description:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

pokemon.name: poliwhirl
pokemon.description:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

pokemon.name: poliwrath
pokemon.description:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

pokemon.name: politoed
pokemon.description:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

pokemon.name: magikarp
pokemon.description:
In the distant
past, it was
somewhat stronger than the horribly
weak descendants
that exist today.

pokemon.name: gyarados
pokemon.description:
Once it begins to rampage, a
GYARADOS will burn everything
down, even in a harsh storm.

pokemon.name: goldeen
pokemon.description:
Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

pokemon.name: seaking
pokemon.description:
In the autumn spawning season, they can
be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and
creeks.

pokemon.name: slowpoke
pokemon.description:
Descansa ocioso junto al agua. Si algo muerde su
cola, no lo notará en todo el día.

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.description:
The SHELLDER that
is latched onto
SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed
on the host's left
over scraps.

pokemon.name: slowking
pokemon.description:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

pokemon.name: oddish
pokemon.description:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: gloom
pokemon.description:
The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

pokemon.name: vileplume
pokemon.description:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemon.name: bellossom
pokemon.description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

pokemon.name: drowzee
pokemon.description:
Puts enemies to
sleep then eats
their dreams. Occasionally gets
sick from eating
bad dreams.

pokemon.name: hypno
pokemon.description:
When it locks eyes
with an enemy, it
will use a mix of PSI moves such as
HYPNOSIS and
CONFUSION.

pokemon.name: abra
pokemon.description:
Using its ability
to read minds, it
will identify impending danger
and TELEPORT to
safety.

pokemon.name: kadabra
pokemon.description:
It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.description:
Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.

pokemon.name: ditto
pokemon.description:
Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.

pokemon.name: pineco
pokemon.description:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

pokemon.name: forretress
pokemon.description:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

pokemon.name: nidoran-f
pokemon.description:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

pokemon.name: nidorina
pokemon.description:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

pokemon.name: nidoqueen
pokemon.description:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.

pokemon.name: nidoran-m
pokemon.description:
Stiffens its ears
to sense danger.
The larger its horns, the more
powerful its
secreted venom.

pokemon.name: nidorino
pokemon.description:
神經質且容易發脾氣打架。
當體內的腎上腺素增加時，
毒素的濃度也會提升。

pokemon.name: nidoking
pokemon.description:
It uses its
powerful tail in
battle to smash, constrict, then
break the prey's
bones.

pokemon.name: yanma
pokemon.description:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

pokemon.name: sunkern
pokemon.description:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

pokemon.name: sunflora
pokemon.description:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

pokemon.name: exeggcute
pokemon.description:
Often mistaken
for eggs.
When disturbed, they quickly
gather and attack
in swarms.

pokemon.name: exeggutor
pokemon.description:
Legend has it that
on rare occasions,
one of its heads will drop off and
continue on as an
EXEGGCUTE.

pokemon.name: sudowoodo
pokemon.description:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

pokemon.name: wobbuffet
pokemon.description:
Odia la luz y las sacudidas. Si le atacan, infla su
cuerpo para aumentar su contraataque.

pokemon.name: venonat
pokemon.description:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

pokemon.name: venomoth
pokemon.description:
The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.

pokemon.name: scyther
pokemon.description:
With ninja-like
agility and speed,
it can create the illusion that
there is more
than one.

pokemon.name: scizor
pokemon.description:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

pokemon.name: pinsir
pokemon.description:
If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

pokemon.name: heracross
pokemon.description:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

pokemon.name: koffing
pokemon.description:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.

pokemon.name: weezing
pokemon.description:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

pokemon.name: grimer
pokemon.description:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

pokemon.name: muk
pokemon.description:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.

pokemon.name: magnemite
pokemon.description:
Uses anti-gravity
to stay suspended.
Appears without warning and uses
THUNDER WAVE and
similar moves.

pokemon.name: magneton
pokemon.description:
Formed by several
MAGNEMITEs linked
together. They frequently appear
when sunspots
flare up.

pokemon.name: voltorb
pokemon.description:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

pokemon.name: electrode
pokemon.description:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

pokemon.name: aipom
pokemon.description:
Sa queue est aussi agile que ses
mains. Il vit en haut des grands
arbres.

pokemon.name: snubbull
pokemon.description:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

pokemon.name: granbull
pokemon.description:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

pokemon.name: vulpix
pokemon.description:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

pokemon.name: ninetales
pokemon.description:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.

pokemon.name: growlithe
pokemon.description:
Very protective
of its territory.
It will bark and bite to repel
intruders from
its space.

pokemon.name: arcanine
pokemon.description:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

pokemon.name: stantler
pokemon.description:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

pokemon.name: marill
pokemon.description:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

pokemon.name: azumarill
pokemon.description:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

pokemon.name: diglett
pokemon.description:
피부가 매우 얇아서
빛을 쪼이게 되면 혈액이
데워져 약해진다.

pokemon.name: dugtrio
pokemon.description:
A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.

pokemon.name: mankey
pokemon.description:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

pokemon.name: primeape
pokemon.description:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

pokemon.name: meowth
pokemon.description:
It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on
its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with
Galarian Meowth.

pokemon.name: persian
pokemon.description:
Although its fur
has many admirers,
it is tough to raise as a pet
because of its
fickle meanness.

pokemon.name: psyduck
pokemon.description:
While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

pokemon.name: golduck
pokemon.description:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

pokemon.name: machop
pokemon.description:
Malgré sa petite taille, sa force
lui permet de soulever plusieurs
Racaillou à la fois.

pokemon.name: machoke
pokemon.description:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.description:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

pokemon.name: tyrogue
pokemon.description:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

pokemon.name: hitmonlee
pokemon.description:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

pokemon.name: hitmonchan
pokemon.description:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

pokemon.name: hitmontop
pokemon.description:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

pokemon.name: girafarig
pokemon.description:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

pokemon.name: tauros
pokemon.description:
When it targets
an enemy, it
charges furiously while whipping its
body with its
long tails.

pokemon.name: miltank
pokemon.description:
Si tiene crías, la leche que produce contiene muchos
más nutrientes de lo normal.

pokemon.name: magby
pokemon.description:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

pokemon.name: magmar
pokemon.description:
Its body always
burns with an
orange glow that enables it to
hide perfectly
among flames.

pokemon.name: smoochum
pokemon.description:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

pokemon.name: jynx
pokemon.description:
It seductively
wiggles its hips
as it walks. It can cause people
to dance in
unison with it.

pokemon.name: elekid
pokemon.description:
常常跟來搶奪電力的
托戈德瑪爾打架。
結果通常是不分上下。

pokemon.name: electabuzz
pokemon.description:
Normally found
near power plants,
they can wander away and cause
major blackouts
in cities.

pokemon.name: mr-mime
pokemon.description:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

pokemon.name: smeargle
pokemon.description:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

pokemon.name: farfetchd
pokemon.description:
The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

pokemon.name: natu
pokemon.description:
Because its wings
aren't yet fully
grown, it has to hop to get around.
It is always star­
ing at something.

pokemon.name: xatu
pokemon.description:
They say that it
stays still and
quiet because it is seeing both the
past and future at
the same time.

pokemon.name: qwilfish
pokemon.description:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

pokemon.name: tentacool
pokemon.description:
Drifts in shallow
seas. Anglers who
hook them by accident are
often punished by
its stinging acid.

pokemon.name: tentacruel
pokemon.description:
The tentacles are
normally kept
short. On hunts, they are extended
to ensnare and
immobilize prey.

pokemon.name: krabby
pokemon.description:
Its pincers are
not only powerful
weapons, they are used for balance
when walking
sideways.

pokemon.name: kingler
pokemon.description:
The large pincer
has 10000 hp of
crushing power. However, its huge
size makes it
unwieldy to use.

pokemon.name: shuckle
pokemon.description:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

pokemon.name: staryu
pokemon.description:
If its body is torn, it can grow
back if the red core remains.
The core flashes at midnight.

pokemon.name: starmie
pokemon.description:
Its central core
glows with the
seven colors of the rainbow. Some
people value the
core as a gem.

pokemon.name: shellder
pokemon.description:
Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

pokemon.name: cloyster
pokemon.description:
When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

pokemon.name: corsola
pokemon.description:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

pokemon.name: remoraid
pokemon.description:
It has superb ac­
curacy. The water
it shoots out can strike even moving
prey from more
than 300 feet.

pokemon.name: octillery
pokemon.description:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

pokemon.name: chinchou
pokemon.description:
Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one
another to claim their respective turf.

pokemon.name: lanturn
pokemon.description:
The light it emits
is so bright that
it can illuminate the sea's surface
from a depth of
over three miles.

pokemon.name: seel
pokemon.description:
The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

pokemon.name: dewgong
pokemon.description:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

pokemon.name: lickitung
pokemon.description:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

pokemon.name: tangela
pokemon.description:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: eevee
pokemon.description:
Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.

pokemon.name: vaporeon
pokemon.description:
Lives close to
water. Its long
tail is ridged with a fin which
is often mistaken
for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: jolteon
pokemon.description:
It accumulates
negative ions in
the atmosphere to blast out 10000-
volt lightning
bolts.

pokemon.name: flareon
pokemon.description:
When storing
thermal energy in
its body, its temperature could
soar to over 1600
degrees.

pokemon.name: espeon
pokemon.description:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

pokemon.name: umbreon
pokemon.description:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

pokemon.name: horsea
pokemon.description:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

pokemon.name: seadra
pokemon.description:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

pokemon.name: kingdra
pokemon.description:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

pokemon.name: gligar
pokemon.description:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.

pokemon.name: delibird
pokemon.description:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

pokemon.name: swinub
pokemon.description:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

pokemon.name: piloswine
pokemon.description:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

pokemon.name: teddiursa
pokemon.description:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

pokemon.name: ursaring
pokemon.description:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

pokemon.name: phanpy
pokemon.description:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

pokemon.name: donphan
pokemon.description:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

pokemon.name: mantine
pokemon.description:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.

pokemon.name: skarmory
pokemon.description:
Its sturdy wings
look heavy, but
they are actually hollow and light,
allowing it to fly
freely in the sky.

pokemon.name: doduo
pokemon.description:
A bird that makes
up for its poor
flying with its fast foot speed.
Leaves giant
footprints.

pokemon.name: dodrio
pokemon.description:
由嘟嘟的某个头分裂
出的变种。以60千米的
时速在草原上奔跑。

pokemon.name: ponyta
pokemon.description:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

pokemon.name: rapidash
pokemon.description:
Galopa a casi 240 km por hora. Su crin ardiente
parece una flecha cuando corre.

pokemon.name: cubone
pokemon.description:
Because it never
removes its skull
helmet, no one has ever seen
this POKéMON's
real face.

pokemon.name: marowak
pokemon.description:
将骨头像回力镖一样扔出去，
击落天敌秃鹰娜来复仇。

pokemon.name: kangaskhan
pokemon.description:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

pokemon.name: rhyhorn
pokemon.description:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

pokemon.name: rhydon
pokemon.description:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

pokemon.name: murkrow
pokemon.description:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

pokemon.name: houndour
pokemon.description:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

pokemon.name: houndoom
pokemon.description:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

pokemon.name: slugma
pokemon.description:
Asiduo a las zonas volcánicas, se desliza lentamente
en busca de lugares calientes.

pokemon.name: magcargo
pokemon.description:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

pokemon.name: sneasel
pokemon.description:
性格狡猾且兇猛。
會趁著雙親不在時
侵入巢穴把蛋盜走。

pokemon.name: misdreavus
pokemon.description:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

pokemon.name: porygon
pokemon.description:
A POKéMON that
consists entirely
of programming code. Capable of
moving freely in
cyberspace.

pokemon.name: porygon2
pokemon.description:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

pokemon.name: chansey
pokemon.description:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

pokemon.name: blissey
pokemon.description:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.description:
A POKéMON that
has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.

pokemon.name: omanyte
pokemon.description:
Although long
extinct, in rare
cases, it can be genetically
resurrected from
fossils.

pokemon.name: omastar
pokemon.description:
A prehistoric
POKéMON that died
out when its heavy shell made
it impossible to
catch prey.

pokemon.name: kabuto
pokemon.description:
A POKéMON that
was resurrected
from a fossil found in what was
once the ocean
floor eons ago.

pokemon.name: kabutops
pokemon.description:
È un perfetto nuotatore. Taglia la preda
con le sue falci e ne succhia il sangue.

pokemon.name: aerodactyl
pokemon.description:
A Pokémon that roamed the skies
in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are
like saw blades.

pokemon.name: snorlax
pokemon.description:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

pokemon.name: bulbasaur
pokemon.description:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: ivysaur
pokemon.description:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: venusaur
pokemon.description:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

pokemon.name: charmander
pokemon.description:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

pokemon.name: charmeleon
pokemon.description:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.description:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

pokemon.name: squirtle
pokemon.description:
After birth, its
back swells and
hardens into a shell. Powerfully
sprays foam from
its mouth.

pokemon.name: wartortle
pokemon.description:
Often hides in
water to stalk
unwary prey. For swimming fast, it
moves its ears to
maintain balance.

pokemon.name: blastoise
pokemon.description:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

pokemon.name: articuno
pokemon.description:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

pokemon.name: zapdos
pokemon.description:
かみなりぐもの　なかに　いると
いわれる　でんせつの　ポケモン。
カミナリを　じざいに　あやつる。

pokemon.name: moltres
pokemon.description:
Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.

pokemon.name: raikou
pokemon.description:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

pokemon.name: entei
pokemon.description:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

pokemon.name: suicune
pokemon.description:
It races around the world to
purify fouled water. It dashes
away with the north wind.

pokemon.name: dratini
pokemon.description:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

pokemon.name: dragonair
pokemon.description:
人们相信它能操纵天气，
所以在哈克龙栖息的湖里，
供品总是源源不断。

pokemon.name: dragonite
pokemon.description:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.

pokemon.name: larvitar
pokemon.description:
It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.

pokemon.name: pupitar
pokemon.description:
Its shell is as
hard as sheet
rock, and it is also very strong.
Its THRASHING can
topple a mountain.

pokemon.name: tyranitar
pokemon.description:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.

pokemon.name: lugia
pokemon.description:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

pokemon.name: ho-oh
pokemon.description:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

pokemon.name: mewtwo
pokemon.description:
It was created by
a scientist after
years of horrific gene splicing and
DNA engineering
experiments.

pokemon.name: mew
pokemon.description:
So rare that it
is still said to
be a mirage by many experts. Only
a few people have
seen it worldwide.

pokemon.name: celebi
pokemon.description:
This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.
